name: LAPolicy
desc: The set of available local authentication policies.

items.name: case deviceOwnerAuthenticationWithBiometricsOrWatch
items.desc: User authentication with either biometry or Apple Watch.

items.name: case deviceOwnerAuthentication
items.desc: User authentication with biometry, Apple Watch, or the device passcode.

items.desc: User authentication with either biometry or Apple Watch.

items.name: var kLAPolicyDeviceOwnerAuthentication: Int32
items.desc: User authentication with either biometry or the device passcode.
